text: Ankara Radio () is a nationwide radio network broadcasting from Ankara. Its first broadcast was in November 1927, by a 5 kW longwave AM transmitter over 1554 meters. ==Footnotes== ==See also== *Radyo 2 (TRT FM) Category:Radio stations established in 1927 Category:Radio stations in Ankara Category:Turkish-language radio stations Category:1927 establishments in Turkey Category:Turkish Radio and Television Corporation
title: Ankara Radio
